adDetails: RESTORING AND MAINTAINING THE NATURAL BEAUTY OF STONE CALL show contact info FOR FREE ESTIMATES MARBLE, GRANITE, LIMESTONE, TRAVERTINE - TOTAL RESTORATION - CLEAN, POLISH and SEAL. WE MAKE YOUR STONE LOOK NEW AGAIN Enjoy a natural stone look without replacing. We work on the following stones: MARBLE, GRANITE, LIMESTONE, TRAVERTINE, TERRAZZO, BRICKS. and ALL KINDS OF CULTURED STONES We do the following to make your stone look new again; CLEAN, POLISH, SPOT REMOVAL, SCRETCH REMOVAL, STAIN REMOVAL, AND SEAL the stone for protection. We work on the following surfaces: FLOORS, COUNTER TOPS, VANITIES, TABLE TOPS, KITCHENS, BATHROOMS, SHOWERS, ENTRY WAYS, FOYERS, WALLS and FIRE PLACE We provide easy steps to protect and maintain the new look of your stone. We leave your home clean and dust free TWENTY YEARS EXPERIENCE IN RESIDENTIAL AND COMMERCIAL AREAS. CALL show contact info FOR FREE ESTIMATE If no one is available please leave your name, phone number and best time to reach you. We will return your call as soon as possible.
